page.title: 02The Garden Centre.
page.content: In Richmond we have an old railway station down by the river.There are the old engine sheds and the old stationmaster's house.The track has gone and the station is now a garden centre.The line used to join the LNER main line at Darlington.In the sixties the railway was closed and the station became a garden centre without any alterations to the outside of the building except for blocking off the end of the platform to enclose the space.The centre now supplies materials and equipment for farmers,builders and gardeners. There is now a modern swimming pool in the old goods yard opposite the garden centre.The old stationmaster's house is now the manager's house. Debbie Taylor.
